description: Families in five countries explain how their plans have changed and how they're staying upbeat.
title: Five families, five Christmases: A festive season like no other around Europe
title_page: Five families, five Christmases: A festive season like no other around Europe - BBC News
maintext: Instead, the family are hoping to see Eva's parents. "We can only see them and not the big family. So it will be very small and reduced," she said. "We also can't see my grandmother who is 97, so that will be very different."
